description: Protesters clash with police and vehicles are set alight for a second weekend over a controversial law.
title: France police security bill: Protests turn violent again
title_page: France police security bill: Protests turn violent again - BBC News
maintext: Responding to the backlash, President Emmanuel Macron's ruling party said last week that parts of the law would be rewritten. However, this has not done enough to assuage its opponents.
